title: Sour grapes: Japan battles to protect premium fruits
description: The variety of juicy grape that Yuki Nakamura is harvesting as the sun rises over his farm took scientists 33 years to develop and can sell for $100 a bunch in Tokyo department stores.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: 'Urgency of action': pressure grows for COP28 climate deal
description: UN climate talks negotiators were under growing pressure on Sunday as the deadline nears to strike a new global deal aimed at keeping global warming within 1.5 degrees Celsius.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Billions have been raised to restore forests, with little success—here's the missing ingredient
description: Protecting and restoring forests is one of the cheapest and most effective options for mitigating the carbon emissions heating Earth.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: Researchers thought they'd find 200 species of plants and animals living in their house and yard. They were very wrong
description: We are biodiversity researchers—an ecologist, a mathematician and a taxonomist—who were locked down together during the COVID pandemic. Being restricted to the house, it didn't take long before we began to wonder how many species of plants and animals we were sharing the space with. So we set to work counting them all.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories

title: New investment labels aim to help savers spot sustainable products—but won't always stop greenwashing
description: From the nutritional traffic light system displayed on a box of cereal, to the efficiency ratings we look at when buying a house, ratings and labels help us work out how to spend money responsibly. A new scheme from the UK's financial regulator also aims to use them to help you invest responsibly.
artist: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
album: Phys.org - latest science and technology news stories
